title: GE Story Builder
description: Internal tool that takes two employee names and generates a collaborative workplace story for team-building activities

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Input two names and generate an engaging story about their fictional collaboration on a GE Appliances project

pages.name: Story
pages.purpose: Display the generated story with options to save, share, or create another

ui_components: Two input fields for employee names
Story display card with scrollable text
interactions: Validate both names are entered before generation
Call window.geaRuntimeLLM with prompt to create a workplace story
Store generated story in window.geaRuntimeStore with timestamp
acceptance_criteria: Both name fields are required and validated
Generate button is disabled while loading
Story is displayed within 3 seconds of generation
PDF contains formatted story with GE header
Store saves last 5 stories for quick access
